Skin-gnawing, ancient RIFF-ORIENTED death/thrash!
Previously bootlegged several years ago, this is
an official release compiling this obsure cult
Chilean bands demos from 1989-1991 plus previously
unreleased bonus tracks! Unreserved,
uncompromising, unpolished death/thrash sure to
appeal those destroyed by the barbaric blitzkrieg
of DEATH YELL and the more meticulous violence of
countrymates PENTAGRAM as well as other South
American champions like MUTILATOR, SARCOFAGO, and
cult SEPULTURA.
